detectors.description:
LexToken._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LexToken__2.sol#175-179) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balanceOf[from] = balanceOf[from].sub(value) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LexToken__2.sol#176)
	- balanceOf[to] = balanceOf[to].add(value) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LexToken__2.sol#177)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in LexToken.receive() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LexToken__2.sol#126-131):
	External calls:
	- (success) = manager.call{value: msg.value}() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LexToken__2.sol#128)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _transfer(address(this),msg.sender,msg.value.mul(saleRate)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LexToken__2.sol#130)

		- balanceOf[to] = balanceOf[to].add(value) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LexToken__2.sol#177)
